818630.name: Secrets of Godhelm: Riverfall
818630.description:
Secrets of Godhelm: Riverfall is a brand new Fantasy RPG where you must explore a world full of monsters, magic, and myth to save it from annihilation.



You are an adventurer with great potential for natural magic. It's up to you if you want to cultivate your magical abilities, or practice the more traditional arts of physical combat. Either way, you will need to defend yourself against more than just the ruthless wilds of Riverfall.



It has been over a thousand years since the last calamity brought down by the fury and chaos of the god Baru the Wild. He laid siege to the planet Godhelm seeking to destroy the alliance of Humans, Dryma, Groves, and Humarans in the country Riverfall - but his army of Scourge was defeated. Today, the old alliances are frail and nearly forgotten, and Baru the Wild is looking to finish what was started all those years ago. Choose one of these four playable races, and finesse your desired combat style to mount a resistance against his relentless armies once more.



Explore the vast, mysterious, and wonderful countryside to uncover the long lost secrets of this land. From The Red Desert, to The Shield. From The Wandering Mountains, to The Everdorn Grasslands. Mystery awaits in this country that is equally serene as it is deadly. You must find a way to unite Riverfall against Baru the Wild and cast him back into the stars, or else risk losing everything.
818630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
